Constructor Detail

Synthesizer

public Synthesizer()
Default Synthesizer constructor with 100 bpm, 1 beat, and sine wave

Synthesizer

public Synthesizer(double bpm,
                   double beats,
                   java.lang.String wave)
Synthesizer constructor

Parameters:
bpm - beats per minute; must be greater than zero
beats - duration of sound generated
wave - which wave type to use for sound synthesis; sine, sawtooth, or triangle

Synthesizer

public Synthesizer(double duration,
                   java.lang.String wave)
Synthesizer constructor

Parameters:
bpm - beats per minute; must be greater than zero
beats - duration of sound generated
wave - which wave type to use for sound synthesis; sine, sawtooth, or triangle
